thread.title: You Have To See This Tribute That A Hundred Musicians Gave To Composer Amit Trivedi
thread.title_full: You Have To See This Tribute That A Hundred Musicians Gave To Composer Amit Trivedi

title: You Have To See This Tribute That A Hundred Musicians Gave To Composer Amit Trivedi
text:
facebook 
What do the two recent super hits, Dear Zindagi and Udta Punjab have in common? The top notch music given by Amit Trivedi. Currently, one of India's finest composers, Amit shot to fame with Dev D in 2009 for which he also won a National Film Award and a RD Burman Award for New Musical Talent (Filmfare). 
Now, it clearly shouldn't come out as a surprise that more than a hundred musicians paid tribute to the composer by performing â€˜Love You Zindagi', from the movie Dear Zindagi . The performance was incredible, and the audience could not help but sing along. It was followed by a special performance by the man himself. This was organised by Xavier Institute of Communications as a part of their annual event, Istoria. 
Take a look at the soulful rendition!
